Chinese.name: CLS触发器示例函数
Chinese.description: CLS 触发器获取日志内容模版。
Chinese.attention: 配置CLS触发器日志主题时，请避免选择函数调用日志投递主题，该操作会循环调用函数且可能造成不必要的资源浪费。

English.name: CLSTrigger
English.attention: When configuring the CLS trigger log topic, please avoid selecting the function call log delivery topic. This operation will call the function circularly and may cause unnecessary waste of resources.
